name: Flappy Banyo-Kazui
description:
Participating in Ludum Dare (MiniLD #64)

Flappy Bird clone with Banjo-Kazooei concept

Game programmed using AllegroJs library By: Sos Sosowski (allegrojs.net)

Music: "Funk Game Loop" By: Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0

Icons by: Elyounssi Wahib (iconfinder.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0

Sounds: "8-bit Sound Effects Library" By: Morten Barfod Soegaard ()
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0

Background from "Free Game Platform Tileset" By: Franco Giachetti (ludicarts.com)
Licensed under a Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0

Design and Graphics by: poyomon
